PATIENT_ID: TEST_BD_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-21 10:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 10:15:00
Category II trauma consult for 55-year-old female with ground-level fall.
Mechanism: Tripped on curb and fell.
Patient hemodynamically stable. BP 135/85, HR 78, GCS 15.
Isolated left wrist deformity.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-21 10:45:00
X-RAY LEFT WRIST

FINDINGS:
Distal radius fracture (Colles fracture). No dislocation.

IMPRESSION:
Left distal radius fracture, non-displaced.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-21 11:00:00
Wrist fracture confirmed. Patient stable throughout evaluation.
Splint applied. Discharge with orthopedic follow-up.
